name: Elite Plus
description:
Elite Plus is a simulation game developed by Realtime Games Software, David Braben and Ian Bell. It came out on 01-01-1991. It was published by Realtime Games Software. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Elite Plus on PC.
It was scored by Aidan Bell, David Whittaker, Johann Strauss and Wally Beben.
